name: Kiki and Lemon's Deep Space Chase
name_original: Kiki and Lemon's Deep Space Chase
description:
Kiki and Lemon are two best friends, a kitty and a doggy, off on a quest together! What's the quest? Well, some baby bunnies have been born with two eyes. They think that's weird and they're worried the bunnies are sick. They're confused, but they've got the spirit. Help them find and bring some humans!

Art and level design by Iggy Ofstie, Programming by Dwapook
